# Natural Logarithm of 1/2

> [Natural logarithm][ln] of `1/2`.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var LN_HALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-ln-half' );
```

#### LN_HALF

[Natural logarithm][ln] of `1/2`.

``` javascript
LN_HALF === -0.6931471805599453;
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var LN_HALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-ln-half' );

console.log( LN_HALF );
// => -0.6931471805599453
```

<!-- </examples> -->
